message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $11,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,300. This product is truly exceptional and I'm confident you'd find it worth the investment. What do you say?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I am willing to go up to $11,200. I believe this is a fair compromise given the situation.
